SEARCH
Package com.app.game.service

Interface PlayerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerServiceImpl
public interface PlayerService
Service interface for managing player-related operations.

This interface defines methods for adding, removing, finding players, saving player data, and retrieving player rankings.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a new player to the service.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to be added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is null or already exists

    • removePlayer

      void removePlayer(Long id)
      Removes a player from the service by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the player to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player with the specified ID is not found

    • savePlayerToTxt

      void savePlayerToTxt(String filename, Function<Player,String> toTxtFormat)
      Saves the current list of players to a text file using a specified format.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file where player data will be saved
      toTxtFormat - a function that converts a Player object to a text format
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the toTxtFormat function is null

    • findPlayer

      Player findPlayer(Long playerId)
      Finds a player by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the unique ID of the player
      Returns:
      the Player object if found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is not found

    • getTheBestPlayer

      List<Player> getTheBestPlayer()
      Retrieves a list of the best players based on their scores.
      Returns:
      a list of the best Player objects

    • getTheBestPlayerInPeriod

      List<Player> getTheBestPlayerInPeriod(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
      Retrieves a list of the best players within a specified period.
      Parameters:
      from - the start date of the period
      to - the end date of the period
      Returns:
      a list of the best Player objects within the specified period
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start date is after the end date or if dates are null

    • getRankingOfPlayers

      Map<Integer,Set<String>> getRankingOfPlayers()
      Retrieves the ranking of players based on their scores.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the score and the value is a set of player usernames with that score

    • containID

      boolean containID(Long ID)
      Checks if a player with the specified ID exists.
      Parameters:
      ID - the unique ID of the player
      Returns:
      true if the player exists, false otherwise
